About UsFashion Nova is an inclusive fashion-forward and trend-driven apparel and lifestyle brand that celebrates all dimensions of confidence. We use our platform to spread positivity with brands for women, men, curve, luxe, sport, swim, beauty, and kids. We are obsessed with creating the best experience available for our customers and employees.Fashion Nova was built on the backbone of individuality and inclusiveness. Our brands are worn and celebrated worldwide by customers, celebrities, and influencers because of our uniquely creative and talented employees.Role OverviewThe Senior Product Manager to help oversee the strategy, roadmaps, and business outcomes for our Supply Chain, Product Development, Merchandising, and Planning teams. These teams are responsible for Fashion Nova’s product assortment and quality, as well as the speed, efficiency, and cost with which we get our products to our customers.You will collaborate with the department heads, Engineering and Data Science teams, external partners, and other stakeholders to develop, define, and grow cutting edge back-end systems that assist product forecasting and supply chain optimization. This role is instrumental in supporting a beautiful and seamlessly integrated shopping experience across the web and in our brick-and-mortar locations.ResponsibilitiesProduct-manage the teams in charge of supporting our Supply Chain and Merchandising and Planning systemsDetermine the overall strategy for product focus areasScope new internal features and products, working with your teammates to gather requirements, write business cases, track progress, and deliver valueHelp write, edit, and maintain product documentationIdentify top-priority metrics and targets for the team to impactCreate and communicate roadmaps based on our business objectives and metricsTranslate business needs into targeted Agile epics and user stories that are executable by product teamsEnsure that stakeholders stay informed about relevant progress and decisions regarding each productRun demos and meetings with stakeholders and functionality consumersMaintain a highly engaged, energized, and efficient teamRole ResponsibilitiesFive plus years of experience developing, defining, and growing multiple business systems that touch many different parts of an organizationFamiliar with Agile,
